title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1727-3.4 - Leasing interview
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1727-3.4 - Leasing interview

State Regulations

At time of lease signing, tenant or cooperator should
be informed of their rights and obligations under the lease, and advised of the
rules and regulations of tenancy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1727-3.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
